name: A TOY FOR YOUR CAT!
description:
THIS IS A TOY FOR YOUR CAT! REQUIREMENTS ONE OR MORE CATS

ONE TABLET WITH AN HTML5 BROWSER TO PUT ON THE FLOOR FOR YOUR CAT/S

I WILL NOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE TO YOU, YOUR CAT OR YOUR TABLET.

IF THE GAME DOES NOT START IN FULL SCREEN USE THE ON SCREEN BUTTON IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER OF THE SCREEN OF RELOAD THE GAME.

ONCE THE VIRTUAL MOUSE IS MOVING YOU CAN TAP AND HOLD THE BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER OF THE SCREEN TO INCREASE THE MOUSE SIZE. EVENTUALLY THE TAP AND HOLD WILL WRAP AROUND TO A TINY MOUSE.

HAVE FUN AND I HOPE YOUR CAT ENJOYS IT AS MUCH AS MINE.

THIS USES A VERY MUCH SIMPLIFIED VERSION OFF MY VIRTUAL ANTS AI. FEEL FREE TO CHECK OUT VIRTUAL ANTS AND MY MAIN PROJECTS, DROID ARENA AND NEST LANDER.
